section.heading: Reference to chapters 1205 and 1207

content.p: Provisions of law relating to appointments of reserve officers other than warrant officers are set forth in chapter 1205 of this title (beginning with section 12201). Provisions of law relating to appointments and promotion of reserve warrant officers are set forth in chapter 1207 (beginning with section 12241).

section.sourceCredit: (Added Pub. L. 103–337, div. A, title XVI, § 1662(d)(3), Oct. 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 2991.)
